name: read geometry
desc: The read_geometry module reads geometry files for modeling.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Use Application Origin
properties.desc: When true, the module will apply the Application Origin. When false, coordinates will be left in internal model space.

properties.name: Transform List
properties.desc: The list of transformation applied to the input field.
